coreAtributes.name: Crotchless tights
coreAtributes.description: These tights feature a gap around the wearer's groin

displacementText.playerSelf: You take off your pair of tights.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You rip a pair of tights off [Npc.name].
displacementText.NPCSelf: [Npc.name] takes off their pair of tights.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [Npc.name] takes off your pair of tights.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [Npc.name] rips off your pair of tights.

replacementText.playerSelf: You slip a pair of tights over your legs.
replacementText.playerNPC: You slip a pair of tights over [Npc.name]'s legs.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You force a pair of tights over [Npc.name]'s legs.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [Npc.name] puts on a pair of tights.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [Npc.name] slips a pair of tights over your legs.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [Npc.name] forces a pair of tights over your legs.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [Npc1.name] slips a pair of tights over [Npc2.name]'s legs.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [Npc1.name] forces a pair of tights over [Npc2.name]'s legs.
